Looks like there are a great deal of code changes, if it is only code format problem, please only commit the code that really changes, thanks
能解释下具体场景么，什么场景下需要调用`WXSDKInstance. getWXRenderListener `
Could you provide a demo on [dot.we](http://dotwe.org/vue) and a screenshot of your phone, as I don't find any anti-alias problem on Android

[demo](http://dotwe.org/vue/9ccfc93e6ce1e0698917530487ff7f75)

screenshot in Xiaomi8(Android 9.0)

![screenshot_2019-01-16-17-56-01-831_com alibaba we](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12729036/51241222-50b18980-19b8-11e9-8e72-b6575e20d67f.png)

对线上项目进行修改时比较有用。
比如我需要在render错误的时候统一将错误信息提交到服务器，如果没有暴露此监听则需要打开原文件然后在onException的时候添加上报代码，相反则只需要添加一个新的类然后通过`WXSDKInstance.getWXRenderListener`拿到此监听，对此监听做一次包装就可以实现此功能，并且对源代码没有侵入性。
PS. 虽然也可以通过反射获得，但暴露出来应该不会有危险

I reproduce the problem on my Android 9 phone, but it works well on my Android 6 phone, it seems like a bug in Android system.

Anyway, I suggest you add the following code snippet in the [corresponding line](https://github.com/YorkShen/incubator-weex/blob/2f8caedb147b13182647a1dab473ba9cb31e54e4/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/utils/ImageDrawable.java#L51):

```       
 imageDrawable.getPaint().setFilterBitmap(true);
```

It works as expected on my Android 9 phone.
As support library in AndroidX has been moved to a new library, which is a break change for all the weex user of Android. So the supporting for Android have to wait for a while. Thanks

> I reproduce the problem on my Android 9 phone, but it works well on my Android 6 phone, it seems like to a bug in Android system.
> 
> Anyway, I suggest you add the following code snippet in the [corresponding line](https://github.com/YorkShen/incubator-weex/blob/2f8caedb147b13182647a1dab473ba9cb31e54e4/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/utils/ImageDrawable.java#L51):
> 
> ```
>  imageDrawable.getPaint().setFilterBitmap(true);
> ```

okay
这个跟weex没关系，只要你用了es6的环境就能用, 你好好看看你的babel配置, 是不是babel-plugin, babel-env没配置明白
[android] sdk 0.19+ 在小米4、5，红米note4上，首次加载本地jsbundle渲染不出来，第二次加载或者加载线上又是正常的

bindingx 的api getComputedStyle 是同步的，应该可以满足你的需求。

https://alibaba.github.io/bindingx/guide/cn_api_api

@liushengyi 那个不成，
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6587734/51300094-ac861c00-1a65-11e9-9a29-54198f82cb92.png)
返回里面文档没说width和height, 而且这个接口的意义和DOM里的不同。
bindingx里的那个是为了给表达式绑定触发的动画效果如scaleX translateX做获取用的接口。
DOM则是为了拿到信息。而且weex官网只字没提bindingX，一个库使用难易度不是靠外部辅助库能糊上的。
你这个issue感觉提问太笼统，什么是indicator？ 是你们自己写的组件吗？ 那这个应该跟组件作者去讲不是weex框架本身。

> 比如我需要在render错误的时候统一将错误信息提交到服务器，如果没有暴露此监听则需要打开原文件然后在onException的时候添加上报代码

* 如果Render出错 *如网络错误、JS执行错误*，sdk底层一定会调用 `RenderListener.onException`。你是在什么场景下，遇到Render出错，且`RenderListener.onException`没有被调用
* 这个接口没有暴露是为了避免weex的Native端使用者错误的调用RenderListener的生命周期函数，如`onException`，导致生命周期被错误的触发。
原意是加了一个远程配置，实验性测试在非主线程removeInstance能性能效果。你这样只是把配置项改为不生效强制在主线程removeInstance了。死锁详情还要从整体机制判断
给image标签加个  `auto-bitmap-recycle="false"`属性
真的有用，不错不错

gcanvas+g2-mobile是可以实现画图表的，网上可以搜到一些文章，但中间还是有很多坑要踩。
如果你的app之前有图表功能可以封装一下给weex用。
不过以上两种都需要动不少native的代码。如果是在纯weex生态里开发，想通过插件的方式集成的话，我目前知道的就是买服务了

看看这个能不能给你些灵感
https://github.com/alibaba/GCanvas/issues/46
先将webview高度设置为1，pageFinish时再重新设置页面高度可解决此问题

手动集成的包 SDK从GitHub上下的最新的 解压缩apk文件有 armeabi-v7a的包 但还是报invokeRegisterComponents: framework.js uninitialized.
图片在不见的时候自动回收，在可见的时候重新加载，这个主要是为了节省内存考虑，毕竟图片不可见了，还占着内存也不太合理。如果不需要这个特性，可以设置`auto-bitmap-recycle="false"`

@AntiMoron  这个只是bingingx的文档写的不完善，实际使用是有 width height信息的。至于weex库怎么样，这里不作评价。

对于修改点来说区别不大，都是加相同逻辑。对于某些应用场景还是比较有用的，比如我们android项目都引用一个common module，我的应用场景就是修改common module在此处添加勾子，对于业务开发部门是无感的，他们仅需升级公共模块的版本，对于非业务功能他们并不需要关心。
我了解你们未暴露此监听的出发点，也赞同你们的顾虑。
目前我们通过反射解决，仅进入画面时反射一次并不会影响速度。

回弹是由refreshing = true和false控制的
需先refreshing=true,然后refreshing=false回弹
状态改变间需要有一定间隔，建议
this.refreshing = true
setTimeout(()=>{this.refreshing=false},10)

@winfredgit  
It is due to access by multithread, you can try return a copy of unsafe dictionary object.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11631084/51532558-640e9a00-1e7b-11e9-9f01-045fbe63136f.png)
[here](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/ios/sdk/WeexSDK/Sources/Model/WXComponent.mm#L281)

> Sounds like you are writing a component to achieve [Html.fromHtml](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/text/Html.html#fromHtml(java.lang.String)), here is some advice > > 1. Add document for your component on the draft branch of the [weex-site](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/tree/draft) > 2. Why not use`RichText` which already exist to achieve? Is there any special reason? > 3. Though not forced, sending a an email to [weex mailing list](http://weex.io/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#join-in-discussions) to discuss the feature would be great, as mailing list is where decisions are made in Apache community Thanks for your quick reply. But as what describe before, this component is not just achieve [Html.fromHtml](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/text/Html.html#fromHtml(java.lang.String)), because the standard [TextView](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/TextView) can't implement all html tags, as [the source code](https://android.googlesource.com/platform/frameworks/base/+/master/core/java/android/text/Html.java#781) showing. As to do so, you can see the front comment **Why custom [HtmlCompat](https://github.com/brucetoo/incubator-weex/blob/10c5576f4d9384967fad67759f2ec2ed39f36530/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/component/html/htmlcompat/HtmlCompat.java)** . The [WxHtmlComponent](https://github.com/brucetoo/incubator-weex/blob/10c5576f4d9384967fad67759f2ec2ed39f36530/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/component/html/WxHtmlComponent.java) has two key points: - [Html.fromHtml](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/text/Html.html#fromHtml(java.lang.String)) to handle all [TextView](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/TextView) supported Html Tag - The rest tags that can't be well done by [TextView](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/TextView) (eg: `video`,`img`) or **no way to do**( eg:`table`) we use native views to render which is primary reason to design this component. **It's totally different scenarios** with inner component [richtext](http://weex-project.io/cn/references/components/richtext.html) . Where [richtext](http://weex-project.io/cn/references/components/richtext.html) is absorbed in providing a container name `richtext` to hold all [inner components](http://weex-project.io/cn/references/components/index.html) , but [WxHtmlComponent](https://github.com/brucetoo/incubator-weex/blob/10c5576f4d9384967fad67759f2ec2ed39f36530/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/component/html/WxHtmlComponent.java) focus on a single raw html **string** like `

Header1

引用块喽

粗体

斜体

删除线

下划线

这是一个HEAR3

` and also support Header&Footer view in both top&bottom sides BTW, The document detail already contains in the front comment. And i will follow the rules to add it in [weex-site](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/tree/draft) later.
@hponiang 如页面提示，请使用真机使用Playgroound APP进行扫码调试，文档见 [如何链接](http://weex-project.io/cn/tools/toolkit.html#lian-jie-she-bei)

有使用真机测试，后面发现了问题，使用ifconfig查看IP地址如下：
```
lo0: flags=8049<UP,LOOPBACK,RUNNING,MULTICAST> mtu 16384
	options=1203<RXCSUM,TXCSUM,TXSTATUS,SW_TIMESTAMP>
	inet 127.0.0.1 netmask 0xff000000 
	inet6 ::1 prefixlen 128 
	inet6 fe80::1%lo0 prefixlen 64 scopeid 0x1 
	inet 10.6.6.6 netmask 0xff000000 
	nd6 options=201<PERFORMNUD,DAD>
```
系统默认使用了10.6.6.6 作为服务器地址，当使用手机的app扫描时，虽然在同一局域但是手机是无法访问10.6.6.6，后面使用
`weex debug --host 172.168.1.23 `
可以正常使用
建立官方开启debug时使用en0的地址

> BTW, The document detail already contains in the front comment. And i will follow the rules to add it in [weex-site](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/tree/draft) later.

Please update the document then I will read your PR, which may took days as there are lots of code changes.
如果是这个场景，建议你们使用Java中的动态代理机制实现`IWXRenderListener`。
This PR will be closed as explained in #1954

问题产生源文件WXTextComponent.m：
行数185至194
`- (BOOL)useCoreText`
`{`
`    if ([_useCoreTextAttr isEqualToString:@"true"]) {`
`        return YES;`
`    }`
`    if ([_useCoreTextAttr isEqualToString:@"false"]) {`
`        return NO;`
`    }`
`    return YES;//问题在这，此处改为false   或者 所有的text标签按如下写法 <text  coretext="false" :style="mergeStyle" ></text>`
`}`
**coretext="false" 是关键**
因公司业务源码需要修改的地方太多，我在这将return YES;改为return NO;

> > BTW, The document detail already contains in the front comment. And i will follow the rules to add it in [weex-site](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/tree/draft) later.
> 
> Please update the document then I will read your PR, which may took days as there are lots of code changes.

Please check [here](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex-site/pull/308)
因为这个demo里的iconfont字体名（存储在font file里）都是"iconfont"，所以显示不出来。请参考文档：http://weex.io/zh/docs/components/text.html#%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E5%AD%97%E4%BD%93
@wqyfavor  大佬，之前版本的代码是可以的，新版本必须区分iconfont名字吗？请大佬解惑
me too，上线前一个版本是正常，更新版本后页面渲染就异常了！
